history.narrative: Law 17-388, the “Inoperable Pistol Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-593 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 16, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-690 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-388 became effective on May 20, 2009.
